features: 1.7-ounce jar of Aveeno Positively Radiant Daily Gel Facial Moisturizer with hyaluronic acid and clinically-proven tone-correcting soy evens skin tone and texture to reveal healthy-looking skin
This oil-free gel cream moisturizer visibly transforms dull, uneven skin into brighter looking radiant skin and quenches skin with 48-hour hydration. Face moisturizer reveals healthy-looking skin
Aveeno Positively Radiant with clinically proven soy and hyaluronic acid, hydrates and improves skin tone and texture, revealing radiant-looking skin in one week

Suitable for daily use in a skincare routine or regimen, this gentle hydrating face moisturizer leaves skin looking soft and smooth, and is hypoallergenic and free from parabens, dyes, oil, and phthalates

From Aveeno, a dermatologist recommended brand, the Positively Radiant Collection is designed to enhance natural radiance and give you a lit-from-within glow. After cleansing, smooth gel over face and neck and apply daily for deeply hydrated skin
body.description: Hydrate & brighten your skin with Aveeno Positively Radiant Daily Gel Face Moisturizer with soy & hyaluronic acid. This gel facial moisturizer hydrates, brightens & evens skin tone to visibly transform dull, uneven skin into a brighter-looking, radiant complexion. Formulated with tone-correcting soy, which is clinically proven to even skin tone & texture, & hyaluronic acid, a hydrator found naturally in skin, the daily moisturizer quenches skin with 48-hour hydration, leaving it ultra-soft & supple after just one use. An ideal addition to your daily skin care routine, this moisturizing gel is hypoallergenic & paraben-, dye-, oil- & phthalate-free. After cleansing, smooth this hydrating gel over face & neck to leave skin looking soft & smooth. An ideal addition to your daily skin care routine, Aveeno Positively Radiant Gel Face Moisturizer with clinically proven soy & hyaluronic acid, hydrates & improves skin tone & texture, revealing radiant-looking skin in one week.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: first time using this gel and it is amazing. I have been using Avenno products for years and their moisture lotion for my face. The gel is lighter and works very well on my face. I saw immediate results with softer skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This moisturizer is awesome, and I am a repeat customer. My skin is very sensitive especially to the sun. The scent is pleasant. I think it's a little pricey, but my face is worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Mild scent, very moisturizing and smooth without being greasy. I use this before bed and love it. I’d be happy to use it during the day, too, if it came in a sunscreen version.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the gel better than the lotion
reviews.reviewText: Love the gel. The lotion feels so heavy but the gel gets absorbed right away every day. Not sure why some covers are brown or green. I reordered the brown cover got a green one but this new one has a slight rancid smell. Don’t think I can finish it before it smells too bad but it works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed
reviews.reviewText: Nice texture, not too heavy and not too light. Seems to moisturize well. Would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great face lotion
reviews.reviewText: As I've gotten older, my skin has become more sensitive. This location has very little scent and it doesn't cause my skin to become red and itchy but it still moisturizes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stuff
reviews.reviewText: Goes on smoothly and feels terrific in my skin!
